feed.title: Syed Ahkam
feed.subtitle: My name is Syed and I love to try out new technologies, programming languages and softwares. I program in Python, Rust and others. I'm an avid GNU/Linux user as well.

entry.title: Introducing Soteria
entry.summary: Soteria is a next-gen verification bot utilising the power of captchas. Or, Simply– Soteria is a discord-bot for verifying newbies. How It works Whenever a new member joins your server: Soteria fetches the verification method for your server. Acts according to the verification method set: DM: Starts DM verification CHANNEL: Starts Channel verification REACTION: S...
